Experience

Junior Data Analyst

Bajaj Indef * Jan 2023 - July 2024

Bajaj Indef is a manufacturing company it provides material handling solutions since 1962.
  • As data analyst I got opportunity to Manage the CRM (Customer Relationship Management) Portal.
  • Perform ETL using Python from the CRM data to provide meaningful insights which will play a key role in making business decisions.
  • Created PowerBI Dashboards for internal use by using the exported data from the CRM portal.
  • Developed a PowerApps-based application to streamline the company's order processing workflow, from new order entry to dispatch. This implementation resulted in a significant reduction of approximately 30% in manual workload and eliminated the need for lengthy email communications.
  • Created and circulated performance dashboard of APBs (Associated Business Partners) and RSMs (Regional Sales Managers) every week.
